You != seen the last of me!
Oh, you done it now...! Here comes the boss!
Me + you = you - life!
Bet right about now you're rethinking this whole plan of yours!
The mark of the Ravagers. Bloodiest, meanest crew of killers in the Rim.
Used to be my crew. Had some class, when I was running things. Even let people surrender sometimes.
Your crew? You were their captain?
Yeah, till I took a blade in the back. Few other places, too. Can thank my second-in-command for that.
Coratanni. She calls herself captain, now--hah! "Kill everyone, steal everything." Real complex strategy, there.
What I wouldn't do to get my crew back from her backstabbing hands....
Would you go legit?
Huh? What are you talking about?
I help you get your crew back, you all become privateers for the Republic. What do you say?
I say aye! Better a captain for you than nothing at all.
They run junkers to our old hideout all the time. You can stow away on one and nobody will be the wiser.
I know that place like the back... hm. What I mean is, I can talk you through once you're inside.
Just be sure you take some friends along--the Ravagers didn't earn their reputation for nothing, and Coratanni's the toughest of them all.
Revenge will be sweet....
Ah, that takes me back.
The Ravagers. Terrors of sea and sky. They got a motto: "Why leave 'em alive when you can kill 'em?" Not the cleverest, granted, but it is appropriate.
Are you talking to me?
Seen you around here. Seen what you can do. I got a proposal, like.
Used to be the Ravagers' captain till I got double-crossed by my first mate. Coratanni. Cut me up good, left me for dead. Took my hand for a trophy.
She doesn't deserve to call herself captain. Sure, she stuck one into my back okay, but she doesn't know from killing or looting--not like me.
So what do you propose?
Get rid of Coratanni. Get me my crew back. Do that, and the Empire's got itself a major player on Rishi.
Ravagers got a nice little hideout. It's remote, hard to get to, but they make junk runs all the time. Stow away on a scow and you're in.
That sounds easy enough.
Might want to take some, ah, associates with you. Even with Coratanni at the helm, the Ravagers ain't nothing to mess with.
I'll keep in touch along the way. Lend you a hand, so to speak.
Haha... revenge, revenge, revenge. Here it comes, Cora....
Ha! I knew the vicious little scruffball would double-cross you!
Have a nice life, short as it's going to be!
Won't let... Ruugar win....
All right now, how about we make this a proper fight?!
Oh, you've gone and done it now...!
You want a fight, you got a fight!
Come on! Fight harder!
You're all as good as dead!
Thought Ruugar would find me an actual challenge.
You just keep coming, huh? Not a lick of sense in any of you!
Go ahead and die now!
Here we go, Pearl! It's on!
So, you're the sorry bunch who fell for Ruugar's blubbering. You can forget any promises he made you!
I only backstabbed him because he backstabbed me first! It's what he does best.
You just raided your last ship!
Bye, now!
Hmph. There's a reason I run things around here....
That's it, Pearl!
Eat beak!
Woo! Go Pearl go!
All right, Ravagers, this is your captain. Regroup and haul out!
Hey, your puppets were plenty tough--got to hand it to you! Oh, sorry. Bad choice of words.
Cora?! No!
That's right, you shot too soon!
If they don't kill you, Ruugar, you slimy hairball, I definitely will! Kisses!
Got some nerve, you bunch of loonies, sticking your noses where they don't belong. Gonna cut them right off is what I'm gonna do!
Bulo? Blast it, Bulo, come in! Why aren't you out delivering?
Better get your ugly rear in gear or I'll find you a permanent replacement!
Pearl! Oh, you scum sucking...!
Someone get this bucket out of harm's way!
Take evasive action! Move it!
Ruugar's hitting us with everything!
No more... time....
Alright, all you slackers! Back to work!
You're pretty tough, but I'm tougher!
This is why no one's dumb enough to take us on!
You done it now!
Okay, let's get this over with!
I'm on a schedule!
I got better things to do with my time!
Just a minor distraction!
Best you got?
Don't you dare make me late!
Is this some kind of joke?
Still got some fight in me!
You slackers! Help me out here!
What, I gotta do everything myself?
That's right, I got ya!
You're making me waste perfectly good product!
Get outta here!
You have prevailed, but it will only get worse, and I can only do so much. Be bold and endure.
You're close. So close.
I feared it would end this way. The galaxy is doomed.
You must not lose another.
It feeds on the blood of the fallen.
It will not give up so easily.
You have made it angry.
Its fury is immeasurable.
It is strong in the Force.
Maintain your resolve. You must win.
Mind the claws.
I'd say it's hungry.
Deadly beast.
Don't let up.
You have done well--so far. Steel yourselves.
I have faced such beasts before, but never one this strong with the dark side.
Starting to lose your signal. Don't know how much longer we can be of help....
I go with honor....
Not like this!
We must end this now!
Let's finish this!
Could use a nice, cool kolto bath right about now!
I won't let Revan fail!
I'll paint the floors with your blood!
See what you got!
You're in for it now!
Every last one of you: prepare for your demise.
You have come a long way only to die.
Come on! Make it a fight!
Do it, Deron! Get 'em!
Yes, Deron... destroy them....
Too much on the line for you to go on living!
Push yourself, Sano!
Yeah, yeah!
You fight well, Sano.
You are ignorant. You do not deserve to live.
Break them, Kurse!
